LL.LOG: TIM_OCNPolarity_High has no explicit equivalent and has been replaced by LL_TIM_OCPOLARITY_HIGH.\nConfiguration must be done by the CHxN selection.
TIM_OCNPolarity_Low has no explicit equivalent and has been replaced by LL_TIM_OCPOLARITY_LOW.\nConfiguration must be done by the CHxN selection.
TIM_OutputNState_Disable has no explicit equivalent and has been replaced by LL_TIM_OCSTATE_DISABLE.\nConfiguration must be done by the CHxN selection.
TIM_OutputNState_Enable has no explicit equivalent and has been replaced by LL_TIM_OCSTATE_ENABLE.\nConfiguration must be done by the CHxN selection.
No LL correspondance for TIM_Channel field.\n Field has been deleted and alignement should be done manually.

LL.LOG: No equivalent Channel field existing in LL_TIM_IC_InitTypeDef structure.\nLL_TIM_CHANNEL_CH1 has been set as default value.

LL.LOG: No equivalent in LL for TIM_PSCReloadMode_Update, TIM_EGR_UG has been cleared to match the SPL value.
